release.name: Is there a monkey in your pants?

intro.p: The GStreamer team is happy to announce this new release of the Monkeys's Audio plugin for GStreamer 0.8.x
This module contains a plugin to decode files in the Monkey's Audio format, which typically have the .ape extension.
You need the Mac-port library for this plugin.

features.feature: Works with 0.8.x of GStreamer and GStreamer Plug-ins
Ported to use the mac-port library
